landing.title: Hub.dj by Portal DJ - A DJ link in bio built for you
landing.description: Join the DJ network to create your bio link. A single link helps you share everything you create, showcase your talent, and get bookings from Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, YouTube, and other social media platforms.
landing.feature_1_desc: Create and customize your Hub.dj in minutes. No coding required, just drag, drop and launch.
landing.feature_2_desc: Connect all your social media links, streams, and mixes with a single beautiful link in your bio.
landing.feature_3_desc: Customize every detail from your Portal DJ Profile to match your brand vibe and generate more clicks.

profile.seo_og_title: Portal DJ, the largest DJ community in Spanish
profile.seo_desc: Easily share your social networks, music, and links with your community using Portal DJ's link tool.
profile.seo_og_desc: News and analysis from the DJ world
profile.seo_tw_desc: Portal DJ is the largest DJ community in Spanish
profile.subtitle_1: News and analysis from the DJ world
profile.incomplete_desc: Are you the owner of this profile? Log in now to your dashboard to upload your photo and add your social networks or events.
